subject: Mathematics
question_text: Given below are two statements : Statement (I) : A π MO has lower electron density above and below the inter-nuclear axis. Statement (II) : The π * MO has a node between the nuclei.

options.text: (1) Both Statement I and Statement II are false
(2) Both Statement I and Statement II are true
(3) Statement I is false but Statement II is true
(4) Statement I is true but Statement II is false
